short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A reddit extension that allows you to filter through the 'TOP Past 24 hours' sorting of reddit, based on time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reddit is a great source for news and entertainment, but the sorting options
"Past hour" and "Past 24 Hours" have a huge margin in between. If you regularly check reddit, chances are you already have seen at least half of the threads.
This extension gives you the ability to filter the shown reddit threads, based on time.
